definition: surname Chen/Chen (c. 1045 - 479 BC), a Zhou dynasty state/Chen (557-589), one of the Southern Dynasties 南朝[Nan2 Chao2]
to lay out/to exhibit/to display/to narrate/to state/to explain/to tell/old/stale
to arrange/to line up/file/series/(in data tables) column/(Tw) row
room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

sentences.english: The Australian collections in the exhibition room include Maori costume and ornaments.
sentences.chinese: 本陈列室澳洲收藏品包含毛利族服装与饰品。

sentences.english: The boys drooled over the sports cars in the showroom.
sentences.chinese: 那些男孩给陈列室里的跑车迷住了。

sentences.english: I saw a boy thieving in the showroom .
sentences.chinese: 我看见一个男孩在货品陈列室行窃。

sentences.english: I didn't know you had a showroom in Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 我以前不知道贵公司在广州有个陈列室。

sentences.english: It is a time when there is much in the showroom window and nothing in the stockroom .
sentences.chinese: 这是当时有很多在陈列室窗口，并没有在贮藏室。

sentences.english: An exhibition room used when the collection was stored in Taichung.
sentences.chinese: 这是宝物存放台中时的雾峰陈列室。

sentences.english: I did't know you had a showroom in Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 我以前不知道贵公司在广州有个陈列室。

definition: to lay out one's products/to display
to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
